appVersion.description: The release version given as three numbers separated by dots (e.g. 2.0.0)

releaseType.description: The release flavour. For explanations on canary, beta and stable, see the wiki

dev.description: true if this is a dev working copy, not an actual release. If true, the update system is disabled.

tracking.description: The API Key used for tracking

modelVersion.description: The API version of the model (e.g. 1). See https://github.com/e-ucm/ead/wiki/Model-API-versions for more details.

updateURL.description: URL that stores the update.json file with information about the latest release available.

os.description: The installer version: win32 | win64 | mac, etc.

description: Simple object for storing information about the current release of the ead2 editor. This release.json file should be generated automatically on each release.
